: : Rodimus Prime : :

Rodimus looked to the main viewscreen that Elita was pointing at. He observed the converging Maximal, Predacon, Autobot and Decepticon signatures in the area.

Rodimus Prime: Primus, it looks like all hell could break lose...


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Elita::

Elita giggled  and smiled, her dad was speaking her. She nuzzled and 
purred. When she saw the main screen  she pointed her little front 
pawn to it  as if she liked that her dad looked it and knew that she 
had seen it first

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus notices that he isn't giving his daughter her normal 
attention.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: I'm sorry, hunny. Importent things are happening. I 
know you dont understand, but it could involve your mother.
> 
>
